content: Vasileios P. Kemerlis Vasileios P. Kemerlis Email: echo @cs.brown.edu | sed 's/^/vpk/' Voice: +1 (401) 863-5787 X (Twitter): @vkemerlis Bluesky: @vkemerlis.bsky.social Mastodon: @vkemerlis@infosec.exchange Google Scholar – DBLP – ORCID – LinkedIn Department of Computer Science Brown University CIT 505 115 Waterman Street, Box 1910 Providence, RI 02912, USA I am an Associate Professor of Computer Science at Brown University. I'm interested in software, hardware, and systems security, with a focus on OS kernel protection, software hardening, fuzz testing, and information flow tracking. I'm also the director of the Secure Systems Lab (SSL) and recipient of the NSF CAREER Award.
